siteMetadata.title: Quick Dev tips by Anubhav Srivastava
siteMetadata.subtitle: Personal quick tips for Web Developers

frontmatter.title: Mocking your HTTP endpoints - APIs
frontmatter.description: Tools designed to help developers quickly create mock end points for their applications for faster development.

frontmatter.title: Admire beautiful images of your source code
frontmatter.description: Are you impressed by code screenshot that you see twitter and online? and wonder, which IDE theme are people using? or you want to share your professional awesome code screenshot with colleague? Here is the tool everyone is using!

frontmatter.title: Manage all of your npm packages for a project from UI
frontmatter.description: Set of tools that provide GUI interfaces for managing you npm packages, both global and project.

frontmatter.title: Watch your Jest based test cases on browser via Majestic
frontmatter.description: Majestic is GUI tool for jest based test suites with major functionality that jest offers via CLI
